SELECT PI.*,CI.CI_NAME , IFNULL(PRI.PRI_RATE,0) as PRI_RATE FROM PRODUCT_INFO PI INNER JOIN CATEGORY_INFO CI ON PI.CI_NUM = CI.CI_NUM left outer join(select pi_num, round(avg(pri_rate)) as pri_rate from PRODUCT_REPLY_INFO group by pi_num) PRI on PI.PI_NUM = PRI.PI_NUM
AND PI.CI_NUM = #{ciNum}
AND (PI.PI_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR PI.PI_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR PI.PI_DESC2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') )
AND PI.PI_PRICE <= #{piPriceRange}
ORDER BY PI.PI_NUM DESC
ORDER BY PI.PI_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY PI.PI_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY PI.PI_NUM ASC

SELECT PI.*,CI.CI_NAME, IFNULL(PRI.PRI_RATE,0) as PRI_RATE FROM PRODUCT_INFO PI INNER JOIN CATEGORY_INFO CI ON PI.CI_NUM = CI.CI_NUM left outer join(select pi_num, round(avg(pri_rate)) as pri_rate from PRODUCT_REPLY_INFO group by pi_num) PRI on PI.PI_NUM = PRI.PI_NUM WHERE PI.PI_NUM = #{piNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO(PI_NAME, PI_PRICE, PI_UNIT, PI_IMG_PATH, CI_NUM, PI_DESC, PI_DESC2) VALUES(#{piName}, #{piPrice}, #{piUnit}, #{piImgPath}, #{ciNum}, #{piDesc},#{piDesc2})
